overview:
Serial entrepreneur, leads creative teams in the gaming (tabletop and video) industries.

CEO of Goblinworks, Inc.; a developer of massively multiplayer online RPGs, currently working on Pathfinder Online, a fantasy sandbox MMO.

Former CMO of CCP, hf.; a developer of massively multiplayer online RPGs, notable for EVE Online and World of Darkness.

Former VP of Tabletop RPGs and the Dungeons & Dragons Brand Manager at Hasbro (NYSE:HAS) subsidiary Wizards of the Coast; lead design and release of 3rd Edition of D&D, created the Open Gaming License.

Former VP of Product Development & Co-Founder of Five Rings Publishing Group; acquired by Wizards of the Coast in 1997, notable for publishing successful collectible card games Legend of the Five Rings and Deadlands: Doomtown.

Former manager and Co-Founder of ISOMEDIA, Inc; a successful regional ISP in the Seattle area, worked on software development projects, new business development, marketing, and data processing.

relationships.title: VP of Tabletop RPGs, D&D Brand Manager
